column4: rm -r on what I thought was just the folder that linked to /dev/sdb3

keep that partition unmounted, and try 'foremost' to recover any important files
there's also apparently and 'extundelete' tool which undeletes files from ext3/ext4

first thing you want to do is remount read-only, to avoid trashing anything by writing to the disk

heh, what timezone are you in?
sudo umount /media/help
then try sudo umount /dev/sdb3
got rid of them all.  left me with an empty drive
it would be good if I could get everything
recommend you try extundelete first

that should install you a compiler and a make tool
